title: Homotrinuclear ruthenium(II) and rhodium(I) complexes of redox-active tris(ferrocenyl)arene-based tris-phosphanes
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,24652-24660
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03822C, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Axel Straube, Peter Coburger, Evamarie Hey-Hawkins
C 3 -symmetric homotrinuclear RhI and RuII complexes with four accessible oxidation states relating to the tris(ferrocenyl)arene backbone were prepared, making these complexes potentially suitable for redox-switchable catalysis or other applications.
